events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under our Engineering department for further steps.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application process.
We conducted an initial screening interview to discuss your experience with software development and coding practices.
Thank you for promptly responding and providing additional details about your recent engineering projects.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th, focusing on software development skills and problem-solving.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong knowledge in coding and system design.
We have scheduled your HR interview to discuss culture fit, benefits, and company values on May 15th.
Your HR interview was completed smoothly with a positive reception regarding your interpersonal skills.
We are pleased to propose you an offer to join our engineering team with a competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for providing your feedback on the offer. We are glad to hear your enthusiasm about the role.
You have accepted the offer. Welcome aboard! We are excited to have you on our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, including access setup, orientation sessions, and team introductions.
The hiring process is officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering department.
